Makanan enak. Kolam renang bersih. Kamar deluxe nyaman walaupun ga dapet balcon, hanya saja saat awal masuk  dan letakin card, listrik agak lama nyalanya. Setelah itu ga ada kendala.

text:
ini pertama kali saya menginap di hotel adhiwangsa, letak nya yg strategis ditengah kota, akses dekat kalo mau jalan². memberi kesan sangat baik👍🏻, saat pertama masuk lobby saya sudah disambut ramah oleh resepsionis dan dibantu check-in, kemudian untuk fasilitas kamar juga cukup memuaskan untuk hotel bintang4, tempat favorit saya selama disini adalah apsara swimmingpool😍tempat nya luas,bersih dan cocok untuk bersantai🤩 untuk tempat parking juga sangat luas, untuk breakfast juga cukup memuaskan untuk hotel bintang4, nexttime akan berkunjung lagi kesini.
 thank you hotel adhiwangsa, the best hotel in solo ⭐⭐⭐⭐ im appreciate👏🏻
title: staycation bersama hotel adhiwangsa

text: Hotelnya bagus banget, kamar bersih, pelayanannya ramah, free wifi kenceng, disediain welcome drink yg seger bgt, breakfast juga bermacam macam dan enak semua. Ga akan kapok buat balik lagi ke Hotel Adhiwangsa.
title: Review Hotel Adhiwangsa Solo

text: Kamar sangat luas untuk dihuni 2 orang. Kebersihan terjaga, seluruh perlengkapan di dalam kamar, seperti sabun, sikat gigi, pasta gigi, dll sangat tertata rapi. Selain itu juga seluruh staff ramah banget.
title: Review Hotel Adhiwangsa

text: Pengalaman yang sangat menyenangkan dan memuaskan di hotel Adhiwangsa. Dengan fasilitas yang lengkap, spa, jacuzi, suana, swimming pool, gym dan bisa d nikmati gratis eg guess. Makanannya enak fan pelayannya ramah dan full service. Puas banget lho... nginap disana.

text: Terimakasih Adhiwangsa sudah memberikan kenyamanan saat kami menginap. Kamar Luas dan fasilitas lengkap membuat betah kami sekeluaga umtuk staycation. Kolam renang bersih dan suasana nyaman. Ramah anak. Makan pagi rekomended.
title: Staycation

Tapi maaf kmrn tgl 25 november saya menginap saluran kamar mandi banjir walau SDH coba diperbaiki oleh room service tapi blm bisa tuntas terpaksa saya buka drainnya. 
Dan door closernya juga macet, jadi ketika anak saya tutup pintu , ternyata pintu belum menutup sempurna. 
Itu aja,semoga adhiwangsa terus maju y.

title: Cozy tapi masih ada yang perlu ditingkatkan

text: Staf Ramah, pelayanan sangat baik, makanan sangat enak, suasana sangat enak, lokasi strategis di tengah kota Surakarta. halman parkir sangat luas  sehingga tidak akan kesulitan mencari parkir. Kamar luas.
title: Staf Ramah, pelayanan sangat baik

text: Lokasi strategis, dekat dengan Bandara, kemarin saya mendapatkan free upgrade kamar, untuk kamarnya bersih, pelayanan cepat dan tanggap, banyak fasilitas yang menarik, sayang saya hanya menginap sebentar.
title: Pengalaman Luar Biasa Menginap di Adhiwangsa Hotel and Convention Solo

text:
Hotel dengan konsep yang sangat bagus sekali, dengan luas kamar yang memuaskan serta kebersihan yang dijaga dimasa pandemi seperti ini. 
Kolam renang yang luas, makanan yang lezat, serta kebun yang terjaga menjadi nilai tambah selama 2 hari saya menginap disini.
title: Hotel dengan fasilitas keren

text: Pertama kalinya nginep di adiwangsa. Tau hotel ini dr traveloka. Gak nyangka ternyata tempatnya asyiik banget buat liburan bareng keluarga. Paaas banget utk liburan di tengah pandemi gini, meski cuma dihotel tp bs menikmati banyak hiburan bareng keluarga. Pelayannya oke... Makananya enak dan yg paling pentiing banyak spot bermain yg menyenangkan utk anak2. Next time.... InsyaAllah balik lagi kesana buat liburan. Doain ada rizki lagi yaa... Syukur2 kasih voucher gratis menginap disana. Biar bs secepatnya liburan lg kesana🤭😁😁
title: Stay cation seruu di adiwangsa hotel

text:
Ini kali kedua kami staycation di kota Solo dan menginap di hotel Adhiwangsa ini..ngrasa ketagihan sih krn pernah sekali nginep sini sblm pandemi dan meninggalkan kesan yang oke punya utk hotel ini.
Dr pelayanannya yg baik serta fasilitasnya yg super lengkap ada di hotel ini.
Dg harga yg relatif oke dikantong, kita bs dpt kamar yg nyaman,fasilitas lengkap dan suasana yg menyenangkan.
Recommended bgt deh utk yg mau staycation dg nuansa hotel yg nyaman dan tenang.
Suskes trus utk Adhiwangsa Hotel & Convention Solo.
title: Staycation from Jogja

text:
Hotel bangunan bergaya Eropa,mewah nyaman bersih staff baik dan membantu.proses check in cepat ,sambil menunggu di kasih welcome drink.mantap
Fasilitas hotel lengkap.cocok untuk berlibur bersama teman atau keluarga.
Thanks Adhiwangsa
title: Nice

text:
hotel yang nyaman,bersih,area hotel sejuk nyaman untuk berlibur bersama keluarga.breakfast menu komplit enak👍
kolam renang luas bersih.recommended hotel.akan saya share ke teman2 jika berlibur di solo silahkan ke adhiwangsa.
title: good hotel

text: Untuk kebersihan kamarnya bagus, berkualitas, namun terkadang sarung bantal agak bau apek. Kamar mandi juga bersih. Pelayanan dari di Cust Serv maupun roomservice juga baik, ramah semua. Makanan enak.
title: Sort time to rest

text: Kamarnya bersih, nyaman, wifi di dalam kamar juga kuat. Pelayanan dari staff ramah. Harga juga reasonable. Menu breakfast kurang banyak, tapi rasa cukup baik, bubur kacang hijaunya enak saya suka, wangi dan lembut.
title: Clean and comfy

text:
Terimakasih pelayanan baik dan staff ramah, depan hotel ada angkringan kalo malem jadi bisa jajan deket hotel, sebelahnya juga deket sama minimarket. Sayangnya staycation pas pandemi jadi breakfast dianter ke kamar huhu. Kalo sore kadang ada les renang anak jd gabisa puas berenang, apalagi minggu pagi ada zumba aquatic, jadi rame deh berisik.
Bisa jalan jalan depan hotel di halaman luas bgt.
title: Staycation seru

text: Secara umum hotel sangat bagus, tenang, bersih dan nyaman. Dari sisi pelayanan juga baik dan ramah. Tempat parkir cukup luas dan aman. Hanya saja di kamar tempat kami menginap (208) suara AC-nya agak berisik, mungkin perlu perawatan atau bahkan diganti yang baru. Kemudian di sebelah kamar sering terdengar suara-suara yang agak mengganggu yang kelihatannya berasal dari aktivitas sebuah tempat penyimpanan barang. Semoga ke depan ada perbaikan. Namun secara keseluruhan kami cukup puas menginap di Hotel Adhiwangsa. Jika ada agenda kegiatan di Solo lagi, kami akan mempertimbangkan untuk menginap lagi di Adhiwangsa.
title: Puas Menginap di Adhiwangsa

text: Staycation yg sangat berkesan.. hotel yg nyaman, bersih, prokes covid 19 dijalankan.. pelayanannya ramah.. fasilitas lengkap dan bersih.. tidak perlu keluar hotel sudah bisa menikmati ciri khas solo.. wedhangan.. kuliner solo seperti tengkleng rica iga yang lezat.. booth batik khas solo.. juga tersedia mainan utk anak2.. parkir luas dan aman dengan taman2 yg terawat asri.. Highly recommended hotel to stay while in solo..
title: Solo ada di Adhiwangsa Hotel

text: Fasilitas Lengkap dan Bagus.. Kebersihan Terjaga.. Tempat Parkir Luas...Lokasi Sangat Strategis.dan Mudah Dicari.. Secara Keseluruhan Sudah Baik.. Khusus Untuk Pelayanan Semakin Ditingkatkan Agar Semakin Lebih Baik Lagi Kedepannya..
title: HOTEL YANG NYAMAN

text: hotel bersih dan nyaman tamanya luas,suasananya nyaman,tempat strategis,dan makanan enak enak semuanya dan gampang kalau mau cari makan online juga karena dekat deengan manahan dan dekat dengan pusat kota solo
title: adhiwangsa solo

text: Akhir2 ini, bila ada kunjungan ke solo, kami memilih Adhiwangsa Hotel & Convention utk akomodasi. Hotelnya bersih, pelayanan yg baik, makanannya enak, dan lokasi strategis mudah dijangkau serta harganya pas. Lingkungan sekitar hotel juga nyaman, pagi2 bisa jalan2 cari kuliner /jajanan lokal. Pokoknya Adhiwangsa Hotel & Convention pilihan pertama bila pergi ke solo, semoga bisa terus dipertahankan kualitasnya.

text:
Pada saat check in lancar
Staff ramah sekali
Hotelnya bagus
Wifinya sangat lancar
Kamar bagus dan sesuai expektasi
Sangat rekomendasi untuk menginap di sini
Ada fitness center can juga kolam renang
Tempatnya seperti resort karena luas bisa buat jogging track
Kami ada masukan untuk adhiwangsa hotel solo

1. Kecepatan mengangkat telepon jika tamu menelpon.

2. Kecepatan mengantarkan sesuatu ke kamar tamu jika tamu menelpon untuk kebutuhan sesuatu.

3. Kebersihan kamar harus teliti dan benar benar bersih walaupun itu lantai,kayu2 yang ada di kamar,meja kerja,lemari,kamar mandi,remote tv kalau bisa dikasih wadah remote tv atau di plastik,gelas di dalam kamar dan di dalam kamar mandi dan lampu di kamar.

4. Seluruh Staff & HOD kalau bertemu dengan tamu atau berpapasan dengan tamu di mohon untuk menyapa supaya para tamu yang menginap atau yang ada event di hotel ini nyaman dan seperti rumah sendiri.

5. Pada saat breakfast mohon untuk kecepatan waiter mengambil piring kotor dan sejenisnya setelah tamu breakfast. atau di kasih tempat untuk self service jadi setelah tamu makan bisa di taruh ke tempat yang disediakan.

6. Harus adanya koordinasi yg kuat dan erat yg paling utama adalah FO,HK,FB dan Engineering Department untuk keperluan tamu yang stay.

Mungkin dengan masukan ini bisa menaikkan ranking di tripadvisor dan juga rating hotel bagus dan ramah di Solo.

Saya menginap sudah kurang lebih satu minggu untuk bulan Januari ini, dan keramah tahaman dari pihak hotel sangat menyejukkan hati.
Mungkin ada sedikit masukan untuk memberi garis parkir untuk parkir mobil agar lebih tertata, dan untuk parkir motor bisa dipindah ke dekat lobby, karena jika membawa motor pribadi, akses ke lobby dan kamar terlalu jauh.

text:
Sy menginap 1 malam di kamar Deluxe.

Nilai (+):
- Kamar cukup bersih. Handuk bersih dan tebal. Seprai sarung bantal bersih. Karpet bersih
- Kamar cukup luas
- Dalam kamar tersedia hair dryer, chiler, dan removeable shower

Nilai (-):
- Hotel ini katanya bintang 4, tetapi mengapa tidak ada bellboy yg menyambut di depan atai sekedar menolong membawa barang? Mengapa juga tidak ada satpam di gerbang depan yg menolong untuk menyebrangkan kendaraan tamu keluar/masuk hotel? Servicenya mengecewakan.
- Sarapan cukup variatif namun rasanya biasa saja
- Parkir hotel luas tp sayang tidak ada shelternya. Mobil yg diparkir bisa kena panas/hujan.

Waktu menginap disini, kolam renang sdg proses perbaikan. Jadi tidak mencoba kolam renangnya.

text:
Pada saat check in disambut ramah oleh Mbak Dina yang baik dan ramah sekali kami sangat suka itu dan mohon untuk di pertahankan, Setelah mendapatkan kamar kami langsung menuju kamar kami yang telah kami pesan dan di dalam kamar untuk requestnya belum di kirim semua di dalam kamar lalu kami menghubungi bagian FO dan bagian HK setelah itu langsung di lengkapi request kami. Kamar yang kami dapat di lantai 1 dan itu non smoking room dan Alhamdulillahnya mendapatkan kamar untuk sinyal wifinya penuh dan tidak ada kata sinyalnya jelek. Di dalam kamar juga ada kejutan dan kami sangat senang sekali. Hotel ini menawarkan beberapa jenis kamar yaitu dari superior room sampai dengan Suite Room. Hotel ini memiliki fasilitas diantaranya penjemputan dan pengantaran ke bandara/stasiun,swimming pool,jacuzzi,gym dan sauna. Parkiran sangat luas dan hotelnya juga luas bisa untuk jogging track. Untuk staffnya sangat ramah akan tetapi tidak semuanya menyapa tamu itu yang sangat di sayangkan mohon untuk bisa menyapa tamu supaya tamu merasa nyaman dan seperti rumah sendiri. text:
Saya menginap 1 malam reserve dengan agoda dapat rate 350.000 kamar superior include sarapan
Check in cepat, hanya saja ketika minta resepsionis menginfokan bagian kebugaran untuk menyalakan whirlpool ternyata masih maintenance (bisa dipakai paling tdk dinyalakan 1.5 jam)
Barang bawaan kami cukup banyak namun resepsionis tidak menawarkan untuk dibantu bellboy membawakan barang ke kamar
Kamar kami di lantai 1 (hotel hanya 2 lantai) diberikan sesuai request: ada jendela, dekat tangga darurat (saya merasa nyaman nginap di hotel jika tau posisi tangga darurat) 
Kamar superiornya bersih namun ac kurang cepat dingin, sambil bersantai ternyata plafon bocor menetes ke karpet cukup deras, lalu kami menelpon Front office, dengan tanggap petugas datang, kami complain mengenai AC dan bocor, lalu beberapa menit kemudian kami diminta bersiap2 pindah kamar di lantai 2
Setelah kami bebenah, kami diantar petugas ke kamar lantai 2 dan kami senang sekali karena kamar kami DIUPGRADE ke Deluxe
Hotel ini recomended karena:
Parkir luas
Mewah interiornya
Bersih dan terawat
Sarapan lengkap bervariasi dan ENAK
KOlam renang dan taman asri
Tersedia ruangan fitnes dengan alat modern yang lengkap dan baru
Ada whirlpool dan sauna
Kamar luas (yg superior juga lumayan luas) lantai pake karpet tebal
Bersih no debu no noda
Handuk tebel amenities kmr mandi lengkap
Pokoknya 4 jempol buat adhiwangsa

text:
Hotelnya cukup bagus,luas seperti hotel bintang 4 keatas.kami dapat harga yang murah,thanks sebelumnya.tapi pelayanan receptionist sangat mengecewakan.ci tgl 31 july 2017 jam 8 malam.terlihat sepi sekali mungkin karna low occupancy,ketika check in receptionis kaku sekali,tidak ada senyum yg ramah.minum didepan salah satu teman kami saat proses dealing kamar.terlihat ada hp yg di charger di atas counter saya tdk tahu punya tamu atau milik pribadi tapi terlihat kurang baik.ada ruangan dibelakang counter yang terbuka sehingga terlihat oleh tamu,kami tidak pernah melihat yg seperti ini meskipun dihotel bintang 3 kebawah.berbeda ketika kami showing dihotel sebelumnya hotel kecil tp pelayanan baik.ketika kami minta showing di adhiwangsa agak susah karna harus nunggu security yg sedang makan.karna mas receptionis nya hanya sendiri katanya.akhirnya dibantu temennya sepertinya petugas HK.petugas yg mngantar showing lebih ramah.lebih sabar terhadap kami

Ketika pagi kami renang kami meminta pinjam towel tapi petugas pool bilang kalau hanya dri kamar dan tdk bisa pinjam lagi.kami menghargai aturan dan prosedur yang ada, tapi harap diperhatikan untuk penyampaian kepda tamu..saya tidak tau karna harga kamar kami murah dan kami hanya rombongan remaja atau apa,yang jelas kami merasa kurang ditamukan.

Terimakasih untuk pelayanan yang sudah diberikan Semoga lebih baik,lain kali kami mungkin kembali,berharap mendapat pelayanan yang lebih baik.
title: Hotel bagus pelayanan mengecewakan.

text:
Hal terpenting bagi tamu di hotel,terutama urusan kerja adalah koneksi internet yang bagus dan suasana tenang.kita bisa dapatkan di hotel ini, para staff sangat ramah, bahkan melebihi hotel-hotel yang ada di solo. Selalu disapa ketika berpapasan, tersenyum serta intonasi nada khas jawa. Mulai dari front office yang sangat informatif dan terpenting proses check in / check out yang cepat, staff restaurant yang sangat  membantu, pool yang sangat luas, suasana malam yang romantis dan satu lagi Koridor kamar antik.keren gila😀.

Informasi dari staff checkin di hari jumat akan ada musik jas dengan perpaduan menu khas solo. 
Sayang belum bisa menikmati fasilitas hotelny.lain kali akan ajak keluarga berkunjung disini.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Saya menginap 1 malam di superior room.
Kesan pertama saya datang ke hotel sangat bagus, karena tenang, luas dan nyaman.
saat c/i juga mudah,cukup membantu dari staff fo.
Saat saya pertama masuk ke kamar, kamar terasa luas dan nyaman.
Tetapi, pintu kamar tidak bisa dikunci dari dalam dikarenakan kunci'nya rusak sepertinya. Lalu view dari kamar juga tidak bagus.
Kemudian saya menyalakan Tv, tetapi siaran'nya tidak terlalu banyak pilihan.
Saat saya menyalakan wifi juga kurang bagus jaringan wifi'nya.
Mohon diperbaiki untuk kamar dan jaringan.
Untuk makanan sangat enak. Saya memesan Bebek Panggang taste'nya enak.
Teh Poci juga murah dan enak. Room service tidak terlalu lama.
Saya malam berenang di pool. Disini mempunyai Pool yang bagus dan luas.
Saat breakfast tidak disediakan tea spoon. Variasi makanan sudah lumayan bagus. Traditional corner not too bad.
tapi rata" taste'nya tidak seenak room sevice yg saya pesan kemarin'nya.
Hanya saja staff kurang ramah kepada tamu. Less smile.
Anyway saya puas stay di Adhiwangsa Hotel Solo. mereka mempunyai pool yang bagus dan suasana yang nyaman untuk istirahat.
Next time saya akan kesana lagi dan saya harap pelayanan sudah lebih baik lagi.
title: Nice Pool. But Room view and wifi also Breakfast not satisfactory.

text: Meski terletak di dekat jln yg ramai, namun suasana disekitar hotel cukup sejuk dan nyaman krn byk pepohonan. Kamar yg saya tempati cukup luas, bagus dan yg penting bersih.Puas, jika dibandingkan dgn harganya (mungkin krn low season jg). Para staf sgt ramah dn membantu, hy sj bbrp yg berada di restoran krg pengetahuan mengenai detail menu dn cr menggunakan mesin edc (bs jdi krn masih training, atau mmg bkn petugas yg shrusnya brada dsitu). Masakan restoran ckp enak, namun menu yg ditawarkan utk sarapan kurang bervariasi.Fasilitas yg paling menonjol adl kolam renang yg luas (namun ckp ramai oleh pengunjung, terutama weekend). Secara keseluruhan bagus, dn saya mungkin akan memberikan bintang lima jika bukan karena halaman hotel diijinkan dipakai utk gathering komunitas mobil, yg selain berisik dan crowded krn byk org lalu lalang, juga membuat jogging track (yg jg tidak terlalu luas) tdk dpt dipakai. Suasana tenang yg sharusnya menjadi slh satu andalan yg ditawarkan menjadi tdk tersedia...bgmnpun ttp hotel yg recommended...

text:
Hotel satu ini masuk kedalam perumahan fajar indah. Walaupun sedikit masuk tapi tidak jauh dari jalan raya.
Saya suka menginap disini karena suasana tenang dan nyaman, penjputan bandara free, resepsionis  ramah, proses check-in cepat, kamar bersih dan luas, sarapan juga bervariasi dan rasanya juga lumayan lah. Hanya saja petugas rerstaurant kurang ramah ketika saya tukarkan welcome drink mas Andi namanya.lebih mementingkan tamu yang order.

Tapi cukup dimaafkan dan tidak mengurangi sedikitpun penilaian saya. Konsep sepertinya resort dengan fasilitas kolam renang yang besar dan dilengkapi tempat fitnes.

Bermalam selama 2 malam bersama keluarga.
Namun sayang room service tidak 24 jam. Anak anak lapar di tengah malam.

Sukses untuk adhiwangsa.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Luas, mewah, nyaman, bersih, friendly dan clasic cukup menggambarkan secara keseluruhan hotel adhiwangsa.disambut dengan hangat oleh reception ( forget the name ), proses check-in yang cepat. Tanpa menunggu lama. Awalnya sanksi atas keberadaan hotel ini karena Masuk ke dalam perumahan fajar indah dan sempat dibuat muter-muter dibuatnya. Saran saya diperbanyak lagi sejenis promo keluar karena belum banyak orang yang tau. Kemudian silahkan tambah sejenis spanduk di serial sudut jalan akan mempermudah pelancong untuk menemukan hotel. Halaman parkir yang luas yang dapat menampung ratusan mobil. sangat cocok untuk acara wedding dan garden party.

Selain itu kolam renang yang sangat luas dan bersih menjadi daya tarik hotel ini.terlebih lagi suguhan whirepool,jacuzi,sauna dan fitnes center sangat cukup untuk memenuhi kebutuhan anda. Masukan saja kursi-kursi yang ad di pinggir swiming pool ada beberapa yang sudah memudar diganti boleh kali yah.

Sarapan juga enak walau menu sedikit kurang variasi.keselurahan oke lah.sudah bisa mengakomodasi perut Anda yang bergoyang.

Namun sedikit masukan terutama dimalam hari, area parkir lampu kurang terang, terkesan horor.

Saya dapat kamar 102. Mewah dan confort.view pool menambah pengalaman yang luar biasa.saya suka di bagian walpaper terkesan seperti istana clasic.ada balcon juga menambah daya tarik kamar ini. Pasti akan kembali di hotel ini dan mohon untuk di pesan kan kamar yang sama. aroma Jawa juga terdapat di lorong menuju kamar yang di dinding terdapat lukisan Jawa.

Berenang dimalam hari asik, bersama orang spesial, mungkin bisa ditambah semacam hiburan seperti live musik karena tempat ini luar biasa secret heaven.untuk kebersihan kamar juga rapih dan bersih sesuai standar bintang 4.

Ketika checkout disuguhkan selembar kertas kecil untuk mengisi komentar selama bermalam. Sy diberikan kartu nama oleh mas riskam maulana, di suggest untuk kembali lagi. terimakasih atas pelayananya. Kemudian sy disuguhkan closing drink dari Tamara yang diantarkan oleh pihak restorant oleh Juwita. Mudah-mudahan bisa kembali Laen waktu. 

Terimakasih 😎
title: #102 is the best view.

Hotel yang nyaman untuk ditinggali sejenak beristirahat dengan mendapatkan suasana rumah yang cozy. Pelayanan dari seluruh petugas hotel yg profesional dan ramah. text:
tdnya saya mau kasi 4 bintang tapi :
1. saya dibikin nyasar 3 x balikan cari alamat lokasi hotel ini yg hanya familiar buat orang lokal, blum lagi signage nya ga ada, di gate pun jg ga ada nama nya,,
2. kamar type plg rendah ukuran bed nya cm 160x200,jd ga kan ckup buat yg bawa baby, jd sy tukar dgn orangtua sy yg type kmr 1 tingkat lbh atas bed nya lbh besar. kmr std jg no view no window, lbh ok kmr yg middle view nya ke pool dan ada balkon. harga ga beda jauh.
3. bantal gendut, kurang lebar dan kurang nyaman, dan cuma 2 biji.
4.breakfast nya kurang hidup.

tapi bnyk dr hotel ini yg sy suka dan pengen blk lg kstu buat transit lg, karena :
1. harga nya make sense
2. kamar luas, baru dan mudah2an terawat, jadi kalo dtg lg mdh2an masi bersih.
3.shower nya mantap, air nya lancar.
4. poolnya ok, sygnya lgs akses ke parkiran, jd driver pun bs view kita lg pd berenang. 
5. staff nya ramah.
title: bingung

text:
Hotel ini sebenarnya tergolong mewah karena kamarnya besar dan luas, ada pool yang besar juga. Namun sangat disayangkan staf yang ada kurang ramah. Waktu itu elevator sedang rusak dan tidak bisa digunakan, tidak ada satu staf pun yang menawarkan membawa koper dan menunjukkan letak tangga. Saat sarapan pun seperti itu, staf di restoran kurang, kalau tidak ingin dikatakan tidak, ramah. Jumlah staf di restoran pun kurang, hanya 2 untuk melayani sekitar 7-8 meja. 
Letak hotel ini pun sangat disayangkan tidak terlihat dari jalan raya.Untuk memasukinya harus terlebih dahulu memasuki wilayah Hailai. Tidak ada penunjuk atau plang nama hotel di pinggir jalan.
title: Hotel Mewah dengan Letak yang Kurang Strategis

text:
It should be a great hotel room of 4 star. 
But i got a broken ac. Could not sleep, as well as my daughters. So it ruined everything. 

The room was actually great they have carpet, big bed, best pillows that make me miss. But you can say there is no ac in room no 118. So sad. 

They have a Big swim pool. Breakfast is so so. Not much choices. Bad coffee. Please improve your facilities and service.
title: The best thing was only wifi connection

text:
It was a good stay. I stayed for 3 nights. The room was okay. Mini fridge, kettle, complimentary mineral water, tea, and coffee. There was hairdryer in the bathroom, which was a big plus for me, and other toiletries were provided as well.
Breakfast was okay but imho, there were not so many options compared to other hotels with the same standard.
There was some electricity problem one night so we had to stay in the lobby for about 40 minutes. But the staff handled it pretty well. They provided some snacks and coffee-break.
Location was not bad since there's a supermarket and some diners within walking distance but it's kinda far from the city centre.
Airport pickup was nice. The driver picked us up on time. And they allowed us to get an early check-in.
title: Pretty Good

text: This by far has to be the most disgusting hotel I've ever stayed in. I heard this is a fairly new hotel and at first glance it looks grand and the room has a nice modern decor but when you look closer, the finish looks rushed and unrefined. But what really gets me is the cleanliness of the room itself. There's bits of Idontwanttoknow at the corner of the shower. Fingerprint marks on the mirror. Water marks on top of the bathroom benchtop. And last but not least, bloodstain... Yes bloodstain on my sheet and that's not the only stain.... I can go on and on but lets just say that I've stayed in a budget hotel with a much better hygiene level. Will never come back here.
title: Disgusting room

text: This hotel is located near the airport and in one of popular road Adi Sucipto Solo. The room is so big but unfortunately the shower door is unable to be locked and the wallpaper seems bad eventhough it is new property. There are two convinient mini-market near the hotel (Indomaret and Alfamart). It is also close to two good cafe must visit, AM-PM and Boga Bogi. At night just across the street, there is an Angkringan where you can enjoy great traditional local food with cheap price. (IDR 50.000 for 4 persons), The hotel has big pool, the breakfast is nice, and huge park with big trees which offer great privacy because the hotel is surrounded by big walls so the outsiders cannot see inside the hotel. There is no sign to get to the hotel but just use the google map or street view and you'll find the hotel.
title: So luxurious

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stay for night only for transit before heading back to my hometown. Location is around Adi Sumarmo airport that a bit in suburb but some restaurant surround so you dont need to worry about meal.

This hotel still not launch yet and just open around feb 2015, this explain why no signboard in front of the hotel. I was a bit lost even using gps since there was only wall with gate without signage that it's The Adhiwangsa Hotel.

If you come from Manahan stadium find the traffic light and see Fajar Indah on your right. Enter that Fajar Indah gate and you'll see great wall on your left untill find a gate and just enter the gate. That's the location of this hotel.

After you enter the gate, soon you will amaze with the garden full of tree and nice grass with some light (i check in at night). Lobby is small with only 2 staff. There was a wedding event on this hotel the day i stay but still okay since it was stopped before 9PM.

Room is spacious with 5* interior, i love the bench, the carpet, the bed and all the things was proper. Bath room is only shower and no bath tub and if this hotel put more amenities and towel this could crown a 5* hotel.

Pool is nice near the restaurant. Breakfast is lack of variety but taste is good. I prefer not many menu but taste well than many choices with rubbish taste. BUT all menus is Indonesian food and could be big issue for non Indonesian. 

I will definitely stay at this hotel again if i am visiting Solo in future. But maybe the rate will higher by that time.
title: Pleasant stay at Gardening Hotel

text:
The deluxe room is very spacious and luxurious to my taste. However, when I see the window, it's too small and the view is the roof, which just renovated. So, it's dissapointing. For a room this big, the window should be with compatible size and view. This tiny hiccup makes the all experience goes sour.
And the water in the pool is dirty. I can't see clearly through the water, and I can feel itch all over my skin when I take a plunge. So, I decide to stop swimming. Too bad, because the pool itself is good.
However, the breakfast is up to my satisfaction. I love the porridge, dimsum, and chichken kungpao is the best here! Although, sausage is too bland, needs improvement indeed. But, overall, I can't complain.
title: Luxury decor

text: We stayed in early June 2015, The room suprising good & large with new decoration. Pool also large with children pool that suitable for family vacation. But Breakfast menu & refill was poor. No varietif menu & egg station.
title: Good Room, Nice Pool but Poor Breakfast

text: I booked into this hotel because a friend mentioned it was having a substantial promotion and it was new and likely to be in good shape. It is located in an odd part of town, not really convenient to the airport or anywhere else for that matter. The staff is lovely and friendly but they don't have a clue of how to anticipate customers needs. Not their fault since they have not been trained. Breakfast was unimaginative and bland. There is very little in the way of western food. The three mornings I showed up the eggs were so dried out as to be inedible. The rooms are large, but very poorly laid out. My work desk was crammed into the walk in closet, and the television was far too small for the distance to the bed for watching. There were zero plugs for phones, laptops, etc. near the bed or anywhere else save in the walk in closet. The rooms are organized around the pool convention area and on the first night there was a blaring wedding band that literally shook the room. At least it stopped at 9 pm.  The hotel is supposed to eventually have a club of some kind next door, but while we were there no alcohol of any kind was available  and we had to taxi downtown to another hotel just to relax, have a drink and talk. Almost none of our taxis knew where the hotel was located. On the positive side, the bed/sheets/ pillows were excellent and the pool is big and attractive. There are far better choices in Solo.
title: Big and shiny outside- completely impractical and no attention to detail.

text:
This is a new hotel in Solo.I haven't had a chance to stay at this hotel and try the room because it located less than 1 kilometer from my home. But me and my family visit this hotel regularly to use the pool and gym.
When you stay at this hotel, try the room with pool view. As you watch to the pool area, you can see many swallow birds and you can hear them tweeted and fly to the survace of the pool water, espescially in the morning. Bring a nice and serene atmosmpere.
The reception was nice, the check in process was fast (I saw the check in process when someone checked in while I was registering for the pool and gym membership). You didn't have to bring a printed hotel voucher, just by showing e-voucher in your phone.
It has very strategic location. About 9 km from the airport (10-15 minutes drives). 5 km from the Mangkunegaran castle. 7 km from the Kasunanan castle. 3 km from the Batik Lawean area. Just take a taxi (Solo has many taxi, but Kosti is the recommendable one) or you can rent a car.
In Solo you can find many local food with a cheap price compare to other cities in Indonesia. The food price almost the same as Jogjakarta. Solo just about 55km from Jogjakata. You can take a train or use a car to Solo from Jogjakarta.
title: Surely will be one of the best hotel in Solo

text:
I stayed at this hotel for my friend’s wedding, and I loved it. It’s located in the main street near the city center, not far from Kartasura / Colomadu Highway, perfect for tourists like me that came to Solo by a car. Also, the parking area was spacious, and there were many shops nearby.

The hotel had gym, and swimming pool, perfect for a weekend gate-away. The room was clean, and exquisitely decorated. The staffs were nice, but I would suggest the hotel to provide a spare phone charger for the customers, because I asked for a phone charger in the Front Desk and Housekeeping, they said they didn’t have any.

text:
The first time I arrived at this hotel, the first impression was a spacious hotel, because there was a large park in front of the hotel. Besides that, the parking area was also quite spacious. The hotel lobby was comfy with some sofas and clean. The staff are also very friendly and help provide information for us. We salute the security staff who was also very friendly and help provide culinary information and roads for us. We booked a deluxe room, which was quite spacious, clean and comfortable. Cable TV, a small fridge and mini bar wre also available in the room. In the bathroom there was a hair dryer available. Wifi was good, and the air conditioner was running well too. 

The hotel provides sauna facilities, a fitness center and swimming pool that is quite spacious for guests. The breakfast menu was quite extensive and varied, but tastes was average or standard. Ranging from traditional food to several variations of western food was also available. Also complete with several choices of drinks, such as juice, coffee, tea, milk and others. The hotel has meeting rooms and a convention hall. Suitable when used for weddings, reunions, company meetings and so on.

I recommend this hotel for holidays with family or for some events or meetings. Overall, I am quite satisfied to stay at this hotel and hope to visit it again.
title: Spacious and comfy Hotel in the Solo city

text:
Conclusion at the end. 

Upon entering the premises:
+ lots of parking spaces
+ delicious welcome drinks
+ small lobby but has a nice atmosphere

Room: 
+ clean and comfortable, plenty of pillows
+ powerful AC
- only 1 set of slippers per room, and aside from toothbrushes, only 1 piece of each toiletry item (see picture). Are we supposed to use 1 tiny bar of soap for the hand washing and showering needs of 2 adults? Are we supposed to carry our tiny bar of soap in and out of the shower? Sure we can always request for more, but it is still less than standard. The shampoo is also not of good quality. Does not make a lot of foam. 
- walls are sound proof, but the doors aren't. We heard Celine Dion singing Christmas songs in the hallway all the time, which I personally don't have a problem with, because we like her and we celebrate Christmas. But we also heard kids running around in the hallway. 

Facilities: pool, sauna, gym, jacuzzi
+ well-designed facilities
+ both shallow and deep pools available, and inflatable swans are available for rent. Towels and lockers are also available.
- in the evening, the pool was dirty with dead insects and leaves, flowers, etc. Maybe in the morning it's cleaner.
- there seems to be a lack of staff cleaning the pool and gym area in general. Water pooling in the stairs can be very dangerous, and there is no one to ensure that the floors are dry and the areas clean
- lots of equipment in the gym, but among all the cardio machines, only the treadmill was plugged in and ready to use. Maybe the others (elliptical and stationary bikes) would be plugged in upon request, I have no idea. 

Staff:
+ door man and some of the reception staff are very nice and very professional.
- Some less so. Upon checking out, 2 receptionists (I believe one was a trainee) answered one guest's questions and let me stand there, like I have nothing better to do. In the end, the lady that came after us got to check out before us, even though we'd been standing there for at least 10 minutes. The receptionist responsible for the trainee also should have been more professional and notice who came first. No apologies said when we said we were first. Definitely needs more training before she can train others. 
- Housekeeping seems distracted. They forgot to leave a new bath mat after making up our 1 room, and from another room, they accidentally took our electric kettle with them, leaving only the plug in the room. Maybe understaffed. 

Restaurant: 
Standard everything, nothing special. The breakfast was ok, but cheap ingredients. 
3 issues we had during the breakfast:
- the omelette staff needs to be better trained. He kept giving our omelettes to other guests, no understanding of the queue system
- we are on a low carb diet. We were only able to eat the eggs and chicken. No beef, seafood, or whatever. Their other dishes were carb heavy. Seems like they are saving money by only providing chicken and egg as protein sources. 
- the women's bathroom was filthy. 1 out of 2 toilets was clogged and there was no tissue in the functioning stall. A case of understaffing. 

Overall impression: 
Seems like most of Adhiwangsa's revenue comes from renting out space for events, and their pool/gym memberships, and less from the hotel itself. They only have about 50 rooms in total, and a lot of event spaces. 
The layout and facilities are beautiful and satisfying to us, but the service is lacking in some areas.
It couldn't be more obvious to us that the management tries to save money: lack of toiletries, lack of staff (which then results in not enough cleaning up), and lack of meat options in the breakfast buffet. Also, lack of staff training. Their efforts to save money are VERY apparent, it's embarrassing. To the management: train your FO staff or recruit staff with an education in hotel and tourism. And maybe employ more housekeeping staff.

text:
During my visit to Solo I always stay at least one night in hotels. 
For this December and end of year I chose this hotel since other hotels were fully booked 

To conclude:
+ The price is cheap enough
+ Parking space is big enough and outdoor
+ AC is good and lighting in room is 👌 
+ Breakfast is good, vary enough and most of the food is warm.
+ Kids pool is available

- The room has no view only the wall next to window 😔😔
- The towel was so dull and need to be changed. I got a very very old towel and called front office to be changed but still got the same. 
- I found 3 mini cockroaches inside the room and on the pillows. It was disgusting. 
- Limited TV channel for kids
- When we arrived and checked in then no one escorted us to the room. So we have to find the room our own. 

Suggestion;
- Renew the towel soon
- Maintain cleanliness of the room so there will be no other living things except human 😁😁

Thank you
title: End of year holiday
